name: Type: String | Description: Name of the Screen Event. Selected from predefined values.. Eg: '12'

data.customer_id: Type: String | Description: Customer Id of the User. Eg: '12'
data.from_screen: Type: String | Description: Name of the previous Screen where user was. Selected from predefined values. Eg: '12'

session_timestamp.start_time: Type: Int | Description: Start timestamp of the user session on the screen in EPOC. Eg: '1495618900'
session_timestamp.end_time: Type: Int | Description: End timestamp of the user session on the screen in EPOC. Eg: '1495618949'

session_timestamp.start_time: Type: Int | Description: Start timestamp of the user session on the screen in EPOC. Eg: '1495618900'
session_timestamp.end_time: Type: Int | Description: End timestamp of the user session on the screen in EPOC. Eg: '1495618949'

session_timestamp.start_time: Type: Int | Description: Start timestamp of the user session on the screen in EPOC. Eg: '1495618900'
session_timestamp.end_time: Type: Int | Description: End timestamp of the user session on the screen in EPOC. Eg: '1495618949'

field_events.name: Type: String | Description: Name of the Field Event. Selected from predefined values. Eg: 'loan_purpose'

data.action: Type: String | Description: Action taken by the user. Selected from predefined values. Eg: 'selection'
data.mode: Type: String | Description: 'create' or 'update' depending upon the user mode. Eg: 'create'
data.value: Type: Int/String/Decimal | Description: The action value. Eg: 'Mobile'
data.timestamp: Type: Int | Description: The timestamp of the user input in the field on the screen in EPOC. Eg: '1495618949'
